dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset represents mortality (monthly) data for Douglas-fir. Climate condition: Normal. Cover percentage: 75%.
dataIdInfo.idPurp:
VMRC (Vegetation Mortality Risk Calculator) Export Dataset
Map Type: Mortality (Monthly) Species: Douglas-fir Climate Condition: Normal Cover Percentage: 75% Month: 09 Stress Level: Low Stress
This dataset was clipped to a user-defined Area of Interest (AOI) for analysis and visualization.

Consts.useLimit: For research and visualization purposes only.
